document.full_text: it firm micro focus intl parted company with chief executive nigel clifford on friday, leaving chairman kevin loosemore to take control at the british firm which issued a third profit warning in february.
document.title: micro focus chairman takes over as ceo goes
lines_and_colors: it firm micro focus intl parted company with chief executive nigel clifford on friday, leaving chairman kevin loosemore to take control at the british firm which issued a third profit warning in february.
